original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī bahussutā hoti bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṁ kathaṁ kātuṁ.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī bahu sutā hoti bhāṇikā visāra dā paṭṭā dhammim katham kātu

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā pariveṇaṁ undriyati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā pariveṇam
kissidam te ayye pariveṇam undriyati iti
nattha āvuso dāyakā natthi kārakā ati

original: Atha kho te manussā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā pariveṇatthāya chandakaṁ saṅgharitvā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā parikkhāraṁ adaṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te manussāḥ thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā pariveṇatthāya chandakam saṅgharitvā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā parikkhāram adasu

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī tena ca parikkhārena sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṁ cetāpetvā paribhuñji.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī tena ca parikkhārena sayam pi yācitvā bhesajjam cetāpetvā paribhuñji

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṁ cetāpessatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññam cetāpessati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṁ cetāpetī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññam cetāpeti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṁ cetāpessati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññam cetāpessati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṁ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññam cetāpeyya nissaggiyam pācittiyanti
ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: ekāya bhikkhuniyā, na saṅghassa, na gaṇassa.
analyzed: ekāya bhikkhuniyā na saṅghassa na gaṇassa

original: yaṁatthāya dinnaṁ taṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
analyzed: yaatthāya dinnam tam ṭhapetvā aññam payoge dukkaṭa

original: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā eka bhikkhuniyā vā

original: “idaṁ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṁ cetāpitaṁ nissaggiyaṁ, imāhaṁ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
analyzed: idam me ayye aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññam cetāpitam nissaggiye imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe

original: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññadatthike aññadatthika saññā aññam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññadatthike vematikā aññam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññadatthike anaññadatthika saññā aññam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya
